title: "Fury by Crocs"slanted techno sans
content:
Trying to identify this font if it is a standing font before I have the complete font created.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LogoType\_NoFlame\_Blck.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20101001224511/http:/typophile.com/files/LogoType_NoFlame_Blck.pdf) | 158.56 KB |
author: Charles De Long

comments.content: Do you have a link or an image sample?

Here is a conversion to gif...  
No clue to the typeface BTW ; )

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101001224511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Fury_5900.gif)

It looks artificially slanted, and possibly stretched to me, which would indicate that it might have started as a typeface. Not sure which though.

- Lex
